text: [Music]
I love teaching I love the the energy in
the classroom the interaction with the
students that's something very
special if you have a chance to be in an
HBS classroom you see this is all about
how to make better decisions in a
business context I think of field as a
step even beyond
that it takes all 9900 students to one
of 150 Emerging Market companies where
they work with the company in order to
practice the Innovation methods that
they learned in their operations class
in the
fall students are proud of the projects
and services that they developed in the
fall but once you get into country you
realize that yes these products are
great these services are nice but they
don't match the business
environment and I can literally sense it
in the mes how the tension Rises because
you feel like oh my God can we really do
this can we really be successful and
then towards the end of the week you
have this sense of relief when students
realize we are able to do something that
the global partner finds valuable that
consumers are likely to
buy I'm really proud that many of the
proposals that the students made to
their Global Partners are actually
implemented thank you for
if our students have something that
feels real to them a real issue a real
problem a real Global partner if they
are given the tools to be
successful they're just fabulous
